name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in software testing, I specialize in both manual and automated testing methodologies. My proficiency encompasses **API testing**, **automated testing**, and applying ISTQB standards to ensure the highest quality of software solutions. I leverage collaborative tools and office software to enhance team communication and streamline quality reporting methods.
In my journey, I have also contributed to full-stack development, utilizing technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My expertise includes building high-performance applications with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, while also integrating cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS**. This experience allows me to understand the development lifecycle, enabling me to effectively communicate with development teams and enhance testing processes.
I possess a strong background in building applications aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, and I have experience in developing machine learning pipelines, extending my analytical skill set to benefit quality assurance strategies.
